title: XPtsp GUI
snippet: I’ve written this post to display the XP Theme Source Patcher GUI, as well as provide download links.  Please keep in mind that the goal of the GUI is to create a GUI for the project, NOT to create...
content: I’ve written this post to display the XP Theme Source Patcher GUI, as well as provide download links.  Please keep in mind that the goal of the GUI is to create a GUI for the project, NOT to create or modify resources for it. Both the resources and extras have been seperated from the GUI in order to minimize the download size of the package. Downloading the theme package and extras package will be required in order to use the GUI.GUI Downloads													Link: XPtsp_v3.0.0.26_GUI.exe			MD5: 32ced219c6e33d9a1c1aa7fc057a7771			SHA256: 4526ea338bab21b887d57ed95bad890251be2ea6b36dc0f36e13b490bac3a4f6																Link: dotnet2.exe			MD5: ada2ea4c04f24b0f9b22b1dafbc8a282			SHA256:
